name: Pet Rumble
description:
PET RUMBLE is a strategy game designed for casual audiences. Using AI simulations and simplified controls, players who aren't into heavy real-time strategy games involving high actions per minute requirements will be able to enjoy a good game of strategy.

Take control of either the Cats or the Dogs, assign and re-assign roles to your units and annihilate the opponents!

Best played with 2 Players.

Controls:
Player Cat
W - Assign Striker/Attacker to attack enemies
A - Assign Healer to heal the injured
D - Assign Producer/Breeder to produce more units
S - Un-assign a unit

Player Dog
Up Arrow - Assign Striker/Attacker to attack enemies
Left Arrow - Assign Healer to heal the injured
Right Arrow - Assign Producer/Breeder to produce more units
Down Arrow - Un-assign a unit
